subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: A day after hitting into 22 ground-ball outs while managing only two hits in a dreary loss, the Mets pounded 16 hits and scored a season-high 11 runs on Wednesday night.
snippet: A day after hitting into 22 ground-ball outs while managing only two hits in a dreary loss, the Mets pounded 16 hits and scored a season-high 11 runs on Wednesday night.
